sys_cb_topic.name: Submit a Request

sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_cb_topic"><sys_cb_topic action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><applicability/><applicability_mode/><auto_resolution_enabled>false</auto_resolution_enabled><category>3efd22da0b203300a1b16c2367673a10</category><channels/><connect_queue/><description>ITSM conversation for searching and submitting catalog items</description><flexible_conversation_switching>false</flexible_conversation_switching><graph>{
  "graph_api_version": "1.0.31",
  "goals": {
    "primary": {
      "id": "primary",

      },

          "entity": {

        "130b50c4863f428f9d50e189bebb9553": {
          "id": "130b50c4863f428f9d50e189bebb9553",
          "stepType": "ReusableTopic",
          "name": "Search Catalog Item",
          "fields": [],
          "reusableTopicChoice": "Search Catalog Item",
          "reusableTopicId": "ccaacd71c3a3330012d1758a7ff57ecd",
          "inputs": {
            "catalogs": {
              "value": "(function execute() {\n    function getCatalogM2M(portalId){\n        var gr = new GlideRecord('m2m_sp_portal_catalog');\n        if (gr.isValid()) {\n          gr.addActiveQuery();\n          gr.addQuery('sp_portal', portalId);\n          gr.addQuery('sc_catalog.active', true);\n          gr.orderBy('order');\n          gr.orderBy('sc_catalog.active');\n        }\n        else {\n          gr = new GlideRecord('sp_portal');\n          gr.addQuery('sys_id', portalId);\n        }\n        gr.setWorkflow(false)\n        gr.query();\n        return gr;\n    }\n    var suffix = vaVars.portalName;\n    if (suffix) {\n        var catalogs = \"\";\n        var gr = new GlideRecord('sp_portal');\n        gr.addQuery('url_suffix', suffix);\n        gr.setWorkflow(false)\n        gr.query();\n        gr.next();\n        var portalId = gr.getUniqueValue();\n        vaVars.portalId = portalId;\n        var m2mGR = getCatalogM2M(portalId);\n        if (m2mGR.getRowCount() > 0) {\n            m2mGR.next();\n            catalogs += m2mGR.getValue('sc_catalog');\n            while(m2mGR.next()){\n                catalogs += ',';\n                catalogs += m2mGR.getValue('sc_catalog')\n\n            }\n        }\n    return catalogs;\n    }\n    return '';\n})()\n",
              "mode": "script",
              "type": "String"
            },
            "query_term": {
              "value": [
                {
                  "type": "paragraph",
                  "children": [
                    {
                      "text": ""
                    },
                    {
                      "type": "datapill",
                      "dataPill": {
                        "value": "{{vaInputs.search_term}}",
                        "displayValue": "vaInputs➛search_term"
                      },
                      "children": [
                        {
                          "text": ""
                        }
                      ]
                    },
                    {
                      "text": ""
                    }
                  ]
                }
              ],
              "mode": "simple",
              "type": "String"
            },
            "result_limit": {
              "value": [

                  "type": "paragraph",

                    {
                      "text": "5"
                    },

                      "text": ""
                    }
                  ]
                }
              ],
              "mode": "simple",
              "type": "String"
            }
          },

        "ab7942448add4dacae2b20e1cc1e2429": {
          "id": "ab7942448add4dacae2b20e1cc1e2429",
          "stepType": "LinkOutput",
          "name": "Link Output",
          "url": {
            "value": "(function execute() {\n    var item = new sn_sc.CatItem(vaInputs.catalog_item_id);\n\n    if (item && item.getRecordClass() === \"sc_cat_item_guide\")\n        return vaVars.baseUri + vaVars.portalName + '?id=sc_cat_item_guide&sys_id=' + vaInputs.catalog_item_id;\n    \n    return vaVars.baseUri + vaVars.portalName + '?id=sc_cat_item&sys_id=' + vaInputs.catalog_item_id;\n})()",
            "mode": "script"
          },
          "label": {
            "value": "(function execute() {\n    var item = new sn_sc.CatItem(vaInputs.catalog_item_id);\n    if (item) {\n        var catItemJson = item.read({\n            'name' : ''\n        }, false);\n        return catItemJson.name || '';\n    }\n    return '';\n})()\n",
            "mode": "script"
          },
          "header": {
            "value": [
              {
                "type": "paragraph",
                "children": [
                  {
                    "text": ""
                  },
                  {
                    "text": "Use the link below to submit your request"
                  },
                  {
                    "text": ""
                  }
                ]
              }
            ],
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          },
          "linkType": "single",
          "introMsg": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "listOfLinks": ""

        "3dd4a93571614f2ba78113ec86b3fd3b": {

        "5f264c3a3c1d4b1885d98080c1433ed1": {
          "id": "5f264c3a3c1d4b1885d98080c1433ed1",
          "stepType": "TextOutput",
          "name": "Request Complete Message",
          "value": {
            "value": [
              {
                "type": "paragraph",
                "children": [
                  {
                    "text": ""
                  },
                  {
                    "text": "Your request has been submitted. Here are the details:"

              }

        "ac71911a5c694bcd9a9f3cbe470a1465": {
          "id": "ac71911a5c694bcd9a9f3cbe470a1465",
          "stepType": "LinkOutput",
          "name": "Inserted Record Link",
          "url": {
            "value": "(function execute() {\n    var tableName = vaInputs.record_table.getValue();\n    var recordId = vaInputs.record_id.getValue();\n    var screenId = '';\n    if (vaVars.portalName === 'mesp') {\n        var mobileDLink = new global.MobileDeepLinkGenerator('request');\n        if (tableName == 'sc_req_item')\n            screenId = '7516f9d787232300e0ef0cf888cb0b4d';\n        else if (tableName == 'sc_request')\n            screenId = '276dd3edb79033001befcd58de11a9c7';\n        else if (tableName == 'incident')\n            screenId = 'ebb94d9c0f2033001befa68ca8767e4e';\n        else\n            screenId = 'd39eb2db87772300e0ef0cf888cb0bcb';\n\n        return mobileDLink.getFormScreenLink(screenId, tableName, recordId);\n    }\n\n    return vaVars.baseUri + vaVars.portalName + \n    \"?id=ticket&table=\" + tableName +\"&sys_id=\" + recordId;\n})()\n",
            "mode": "script"
          },
          "label": {
            "value": "(function execute() {\n    var message = '';\n    var gr = new GlideRecord(vaInputs.record_table.getValue());\n    gr.addQuery(\"sys_id\", vaInputs.record_id);\n    gr.query();\n    if(gr.next()) {\n       message =  gs.getMessage('View submitted request ({0})', gr.getValue('task_effective_number'));\n    }\n    return message;\n})()\n",
            "mode": "script"
          },
          "header": {
            "value": "(function execute() {\n    return '';\n})()",
            "mode": "script"
          },
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          },
          "linkType": "single",
          "introMsg": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "simple"
          },

          "expression": {
            "mode": "script",
            "value": "(function execute() {\n    /* Return true or false to indicate the branch condition's applicability.\n       For example:\n\n       var applies = vaInputs.first_name == 'Bill' ? true : false;\n       return applies;\n    */\n   return !!vaInputs.catalog_item_id.getValue() && vaInputs.catalog_item_id.getValue() != \"-1\";\n})()\n"

          "expression": {
            "mode": "script",
            "value": "(function execute() {\n    /* Return true or false to indicate the branch condition's applicability.\n       For example:\n\n       var applies = vaInputs.first_name == 'Bill' ? true : false;\n       return applies;\n    */\n    return vaInputs.catalog_item_id.getValue() == \"-1\"\n})()\n"

      "value": {
        "mode": "script",
        "value": "(function execute() {\n    if (vaContext.deviceType == 'ios' || vaContext.deviceType == 'android')\n        return 'mesp';\n\n    return gs.getProperty('sn_itsm_va.com.snc.itsm.virtualagent.portal_url');\n})()\n"
